content.guideline1: Guidelines for Admission and Planned Theatre Bookings
content.guideline2: Patients are required to present negative COVID-19 test results, not older than 3 days upon admission.
content.guideline3: Patients booked for day surgeries must present themselves at the hospital two hours prior to the time of the planned surgery.
content.guideline4: Patients booked for elective surgeries must present themselves at the hospital by 6:30 am on the day of the surgery.
content.guideline5: Patients booked for emergency surgeries must present themselves at the hospital as soon as possible.
content.guideline6: Patients who are booked for elective surgeries must have a pre-operative assessment done at least 48 hours prior to the surgery.
content.guideline7: Patients who are booked for emergency surgeries must have a pre-operative assessment done as soon as possible.
content.guideline8: Patients who are booked for day surgeries must have a pre-operative assessment done at least 24 hours prior to the surgery.
admissiondesc: Explore our admission charges and ensure a smooth experience during your stay.
admissionp: Please observe the following guidelines for admission and planned theatre bookings, whether surgical or medical.
admnote: The discharge process should take a maximum of 2 hours where all the required documents are available. Should it take longer, please contact the nurse in charge of the ward you were admitted in for assistance.
